    Methods in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player that return TooltipFlag
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    TooltipFlag
    ItemTooltipEvent.getFlags()
    Use to determine if the advanced information on item tooltips is being shown, toggled by F3+H.
    Constructors in net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player with parameters of type TooltipFlag
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    ItemTooltipEvent​(ItemStack itemStack, Player entityPlayer, List<Component> list, TooltipFlag flags)
    This event is fired in ItemStack.getTooltipLines(Player, TooltipFlag), which in turn is called from it's respective GUIContainer.
